wblut.hemesh

Class HEC_FromTriangles

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HE_Machine
      • wblut.hemesh.HEC_Creator
        • wblut.hemesh.HEC_FromTriangles
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type

    public class HEC_FromTriangles
extends HEC_Creator
    Creates a new mesh from a list of triangles. Duplicate vertices are fused.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
